attributes.action: Free TfL travel for London Ambulance Service personnel
attributes.additional_details: Metropolitan Police personnel have free travel access across the London transport network, as TfL believes that it provides an additional security measure on the transport network.
attributes.background: The LAS struggles to recruit staff because of the high cost of living in London, which is exacerbated by travel costs. Considering the health benefit of having ambo personnel on the transport network, would you consider giving parity with the Met Police & agree to grant free travel to LAS staff?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
